Principles of Underwater Sound (3rd ed.). New York: McGraw-Hill, 1983. MULTITARGET MULTISENSOR TRACKING IN THE PRESENCE OF WAKES 143 Anders Rødningsby was born on May 19, 1979 in Kongsberg, Norway. He received the B.E. degree from Gjøvik University College, Norway, in electrical engineering and the M.S. degree from the University of Oslo, Norway, in applied mathematics, mechanics and numerical physics, in 2003 and 2005, respectively. He is currently a research scientist at the Norwegian Defence Research Estab- lishment (FFI), and a Ph.D. candidate at the Norwegian University of Science and Technology. His research interests include detection theory, navigation and target tracking.
